attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that all religions and belief systems should be treated equally and peoples opinions and beliefs should be respected, I myself am a Pastafarian and am shocked at the level of intolerance when i wear my pirate regalia, I also find that the majority of resturants do not offer spaghetti and meatballs on a friday and most owners of said establishments do not take my request seriously.

Therefore I am requesting national recognition of Pastafarianism.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
